channel.title: E-POST on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in E-POST on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: E-POST
item.description: Connector 365 E_POST Entwicklerdokumentation Als Entwickler im Bereich Dynamics 365 Business Central finden Sie hier Informationen, wie Sie Anpassungen im Zusammenhang mit unserer App eigenhändig vornehmen können. Für den Fall, dass Ihnen eine Frage nicht beantwortet werden konnte, helfen wir Ihnen gerne persönlich weiter. die nötigen Konktatinformationen finden Sie auf der Support-Seite.

item.title: New and Planned
item.description: New and planned Planned functions for future versions Reactivation of negative jobs Contacts editable in dialog Other report types (service invoices/credit memos) Pos. service invoices Pos. service credit memos Version 2.4.0.1 - 03.03.2023 Correction for sending external documents: The parameter DocName no longer needs to be filled for successfully sending external documents. Version 2.4.0.0 - 16.02.2023 Added function for sending of external documents Version 2.3.1.0 - 15.02.2023 Hotfix: Necessary adjustments to the data format transferred to E-Post-API due to changes in the E-Post-Api interface.

item.title: First Steps
item.description: Setup of the Connector 365 E-POST Here you will find all help and learning resources about the test version, installation and purchase of the Connector 365 E-POST App*. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page. *The Connector 365 E-POST App is powered by the E-POSTBUSINESS API, a service of the Deutsche Post

item.title: Working with the E-POST
item.description: Working with the Connector 365 E-POST App Here you will find all help and learning resources for the correct usage of the Connector 365 E-POST App*. Simply use either the bottom or left navigation menu. In case a question could not be answered, we will be glad to help you personally. the necessary contact information can be found on the support page. *The Connector 365 E-POST App is powered by the E-POSTBUSINESS API, a service of the Deutsche Post

item.title: Videos
item.description: Videos Here you can find some informative videos about our Connector 365 E-POST App, each video covers a special topic Connector 365 E-POST - Quick Overview - English *The Connector 365 E-POST App is powered by the E-POSTBUSINESS API, a service of the Deutsche Post
